/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day. The sun, high in the clear blue sky, casts a bright light that illuminates the scene below. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars and buses in motion, their colors muted against the vibrant backdrop. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the sunlight. Among these structures, a tall skyscraper stands out, piercing the skyline. The perspective of the image is from ground level, looking upwards, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape.
